    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/112251</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112251</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Ljudje smo med seboj različni</string>
            <string language="en">Differences between us</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterschiede zwischen uns</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Différences entre nous</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diferenças entre nós</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Differenze fra noi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαφορές μεταξύ μας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diferencias entre nosotros</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenci fotografije vrstnikov iz različnih delov sveta ob opazovanju primerjajo, ugotavljajo podobnosti in razlike. Z osebami na fotografijah primerjajo tudi sebe.</string>
            <string language="en">Photos of different peoples from all over the world and recognizing diversity and similarity.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">medosebni odnosi</string>
            <string language="en">interpersonal relations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">različnost</string>
            <string language="en">diversity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">podobnost</string>
            <string language="en">similarity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">enakopravnost</string>
            <string language="en">equality</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fotos der unterschiedlichen Völker von auf der 
ganzen Erde und Verschiedenartigkeit und Ähnlichkeit erkennend.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Photos des peuples différents de partout dans le 
monde et identifiant la diversité et la similitude.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fotos de povos diferentes de toda sobre o mundo e 
a diversidade e a similaridade reconhecer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foto della gente diversa da dappertutto e 
riconoscendo diversità e somiglianza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φωτογραφίες των διαφορετικών λαών από όλο τον κόσμο 
και την αναγνώριση της ποικιλομορφίας και της ομοιότητας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fotos de diversa gente de todo sobre el mundo y la
diversidad y la semejanza del reconocimiento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwischenpersonalrelationen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verschiedenartigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ähnlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">relations interpersonnelles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">diversité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">similitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">égalité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">relações interpersonal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">diversidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">similaridade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">igualdade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rapporti tra persone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">diversità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">somiglianza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">uguaglianza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαπροσωπικές σχέσεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ποικιλομορφία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ομοιότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">relaciones interpersonales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">diversidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">semejanza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">igualdad</string>
          </keyword>
